document.full_text: the cannes film festival jury led by robert de niro faces a tough choice on sunday as it picks the winner of the palme d'or top prize, with movies from finland, spain, the united states and france all in the frame.
document.title: tough choice for jury as cannes curtain comes down
lines_and_colors: the cannes film festival jury led by robert de niro faces a tough choice on sunday as it picks the winner of the palme d'or top prize, with movies from finland, spain, the united states and france all in the frame.
